title: Golden Triangle
inclusions_evidence: 7-nights accommodation Hotels (6 nights), comfortable tented camp (1 night)
Transport by private vehicle, taxis, auto-rickshaw, cycle-rickshaw
Services of a CEO (Chief Experience Officer) throughout, local guides

hotel.name_or_hint: Various hotels in Delhi, Agra, Jaipur

other.notes: Estimated costs for local transport and guides based on average prices.

reasoning: The package offers a comprehensive tour with unique experiences and local guides, which may not be easily replicated at the same cost. However, the lack of included flights is a consideration.
